elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: A large project has been completed and you need to make a backup of all electronic data so that the large amount of data - mainly plans, photos, reports, logs, etc. - can be removed from the server to free up space.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Which data backup to which backup medium do you recommend? Why?
elements.correctAnswer: Archiving on an external hard disk is the most likely option, as the data is rarely needed but must be stored for at least ten years by law. Store the hard disk in a safe place, possibly externally and fireproof.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Which data backup is the least suitable? Why?
elements.correctAnswer: NAS or daily backup. This is an unnecessary waste of space and time for backing up current (and all constant) data.
